artview.plugins.GateFilter¶

class artview.plugins.GateFilter(Vradar=None, Vgatefilter=None, name='GateFilter', parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: artview.core.core.Component

Interface for executing pyart.filters.GateFilter.

__init__(Vradar=None, Vgatefilter=None, name='GateFilter', parent=None)[source]¶

Initialize the class to create the interface.

Parameters:

[Optional] :

Vradar : Variable instance

Radar signal variable. A value of None initializes an empty Variable.

Vgatefilter : Variable instance

GateFilter signal variable. A value of None initializes an empty Variable.

name : string

GateFilter instance window name.

parent : PyQt instance

Parent instance to associate to this class. If None, then Qt owns, otherwise associated w/ parent PyQt instance

Methods

GateFilter.apply_filters() Mount Options and execute
GateFilter.chooseDisplay() Get Display.
GateFilter.createButtonUI() Mount the Action layout.
GateFilter.createFilterBox() Mount options layout.
GateFilter.createVarUI() Mount the Variable layout.
GateFilter.guiStart([parent]) Graphical interface for starting this class.
GateFilter.restoreRadar() Remove applied filters by restoring original mask
GateFilter.saveRadar() Open a dialog box to save radar file.
GateFilter.set_operator_menu() Set the field operators choice.
GateFilter.showScript() Create the output script to reproduce filtering results.

Attributes

Vgatefilter = None¶

see Shared Variables Table

Vradar = None¶

see Shared Variables Table
